sentence.Network_cn: 她没有承袭她母亲的宽厚天性。

entry.def: Someone who is forgiving is willing to forgive.

example.ex: Voters can be remarkably forgiving of presidents who fail to keep their campaign promises...
example.tran: 选民对总统未履行竞选承诺往往表现出惊人的宽容。

example.ex: I don't think people are in a very forgiving mood.
example.tran: 我觉得人们现在心胸不够宽广。

means.word_mean: 1. inclined or able to forgive and show mercy;

sentences.sentence: "a forgiving embrace to the naughty child"

Sentence.sentence: Similarly, those who are able to view the world with amused tolerance are often equally forgiving of their own shortcomings.
